scripts.migrate:deploy: prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm run apply-sql
scripts.migrate:dev: prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm run apply-sql
scripts.apply-sql: prisma db execute --file prisma/extensions.sql --schema prisma/schema.prisma && prisma db execute --file prisma/rls.sql --schema prisma/schema.prisma
